name: Earth Defense.3D Strategy Game
description:
This game is under development.

Earth Defense is a combination of several genres:

Genre of the game "Clicker" - to control your ship, we press the "Fire" button, so with each click you generate coins for further deployments of your ship and allies, as well as give the command to the turrets to shoot to attack enemy ships.

Real-time strategy - you improve allied ships thereby increasing their power and control their additional capabilities.

At the moment, the first chapter with 10 levels is done. In total, 100 levels are expected. Each chapter is a separate section of the solar system with a general history.

As the game develops, I will supplement it with levels and other game mechanics and various properties of ships and weapons.

Please give your review of the game.
